Wonderful, welcoming family. They all help with the restaurant and they offer taxi and excursion services as well. Very tasty dishes with special, home grown spices.
We ate very well, very fresh fish and excellently cooked!!  The owners are very kind and helpful.  Very good prices for the quality they offer you.  Highly recommended!!

Lovely family-run restaurant with fresh fish caught the same day. Staff were all very friendly and even gave our baby some watermelon while we were waiting for our food. Fish was exceptional with lovely salad and rice to go with it:

Very authentic and welcoming place. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. We had their cheese kottu which was very flavoursome and delicious. We also had deviled chicken which was very dry and  unfortunately we couldn't finish the dish because of that. It was very...nice that they offered us a free dessert. All in all it was an okay experien nice that they offered us a free dessert. All in all it was an okay experience.
Very nice family operated restaurant! I couldn‚Äôt try all of the foods but my Kottu Roti was delicious, and everyone is lovely there!

Beautiful setting and beautiful people. Food is cooked fresh and it is worth the wait. Very good price for delicious food.

My wife and I traveled around Sri Lanka and Namal (the owner of the restaurant) was our guide for a few days.
After the trip, he invited us to this restaurant of his family. They prepared their traditional dish of rice and curry for us....The portions were so huge that we couldn't finish it all. The food was insanely delicious. Huge prawns, various vegetables with curry.
If you're in the area, definitely visit this restaurant, you won't regret it. I recommend 100%.
